summary: Facing a sex obsessed culture, a mountain of stereotypes and misconceptions, and a lack of social or scientific research, asexuals - people who experience no sexual attraction - struggle to claim their identity.
cast: Aliza|Antonia|Barb|Joy Behar|Brian|Lori Brotto|Cole Brown|Tucker Carlson|Cale Cesar|Elizabeth|Janeane Garofalo|Cynthia Graham|Elisabeth Hasselbeck|Swank Ivy|David Jay|Poonam K.|Kathy|Morrissey|Carol Queen|Aliza Rajan|Dan Savage|Sherri Shepherd|Sparky|Steve|Hezekiah Sudol|Poonam W.|Montel Williams
keywords: man wears a speedo swimsuit|man wears underwear|man wears underwear in public|misconception|stereotype
title: (A)sexual
